title: Sparkle Slime Balloon
info: The Sparkle Slime Balloon is a Hardmode novelty consumable item. 25-75 balloons are always dropped by Queen Slime upon her defeat. When thrown at players, enemies, and NPCs, it will inflict the Sparkle Slime debuff for 30 seconds. This debuff is only cosmetic and deals no damage.
